definitions.text: (sometimes followed by `with') in agreement or consistent or reliable; ; - FDR
examples: testimony consistent with the known facts
I have decided that the course of conduct which I am following is consistent with my sense of responsibility as president in time of war
astonishingly reproducible results can be obtained

definitions.text: marked by an orderly, logical, and aesthetically consistent relation of parts
the same throughout in structure or composition
examples: bituminous coal is often treated as a consistent and homogeneous product
